!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!PLEASE READ!!!!!!!!!!!!
IF THE GAME  IS CRASHING TO DESKTOP ON WINDOWS 7
1.Right click on shortcut
2.Click properties
3.Click compatibility
4.Click " Run this program in compatibility mode for : Windows XP (SP3)
5.click apply
6. Play the game !
